meanings.definition: One who makes a bet or wager.
meanings.sent1: The wagerer placed a bet on the horse race.
meanings.sent2: The wagerer enjoys predicting outcomes and risking money.
meanings.sent3: The wagerer joked that they would bet their lunch on who would win the game.
meanings.sent4: The clever wagerer knew when to take risks and when to play it safe.
meanings.sent5: The eager wagerer always had a coin ready for a friendly bet.

meanings.definition: A person who gambles or places bets.
meanings.sent1: She became a wagerer after visiting the casino with friends.
meanings.sent2: The wagerer felt the thrill of uncertainty with each bet placed.
meanings.sent3: The wagerer couldn't resist trying their luck at the card table.
meanings.sent4: The seasoned wagerer knew the odds and played strategically.
meanings.sent5: The enthusiastic wagerer loved the adrenaline rush of gambling.
